title: Bertrand Russell discusses power
brief_description: Lord Russell speaks of three kinds of power: the power of armies and police forces, economic power and propaganda power. He discusses good and bad motives for wanting power and points out that the use and abuse of power is related to the difference between good government and bad. No other credits available.
